H0.text: Ecology is the study of how organisms interact with their environment and each other.

H1.text: Biology is the study of how organisms interact with their environment and each other.

H2.text: Biochemistry is the study of how organisms interact with their environment and each other.

H3.text: Climatology is the study of how organisms interact with their environment and each other.

A4.text: Ecology is the natural science of the relationships among living organisms and their environment.

A5.text: Community ecology is the study of the interactions among a collection of species that inhabit the same geographic area.
